title: SREI insolvency case: Expressions of interest invited for infra and equipment finance arms - CNBCTV18
content: SREI insolvency case: Expressions of interest invited for infra and equipment finance arms  CNBCTV18
description: The deadline for submission of EOIs has been set for March 12. The last date of submission of final resolution plans by shortlisted applicants has been set for April 26.
